verses.verse: <S%G3796><s%> Now Late <S%G1161><s%> On Sabbath, <S%G4521><s%> <S%G3588><s%> As It Was Getting Dusk <S%G2020><s%> Toward The <S%G1519><s%> <S%G1520><s%> Of The Week, <S%G4521><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Magdalene <S%G3094><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other <S%G243><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> To See <S%G2334><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sepulchre. <S%G5028><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> A Earthquake <S%G4578><s%> There Was <S%G1096><s%> Great; <S%G3173><s%> <S%G32><s%> For An Angel Of The <S%G1063><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Having Descended <S%G2597><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> Having Come <S%G4334><s%> Rolled Away <S%G617><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Stone <S%G3037><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%>, Door, <S%G2374><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Sitting <S%G2521><s%> Upon <S%G1883><s%> It. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G575><s%> And From <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fear <S%G5401><s%> Of Him <S%G846><s%> Trembled <S%G4579><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Keeping Guard, <S%G5083><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Became <S%G1096><s%> As <S%G5616><s%> Dead Men. <S%G3498><s%>

<S%G611><s%> But Answering <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%>, <S%G1135><s%> Women, <S%G3361><s%> Fear Not <S%G5399><s%> Ye; <S%G5210><s%> <S%G1492><s%> For I Know <S%G1063><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Has Been Crucified <S%G4717><s%> Ye Seek. <S%G2212><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> He Is Not <S%G2076><s%> Here, <S%G5602><s%> <S%G1453><s%> For He Is Risen, <S%G1063><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> He Said. <S%G2036><s%> Come <S%G1205><s%> See <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Place <S%G5117><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> Was Lying <S%G2749><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Quickly <S%G5035><s%> Going <S%G4198><s%> Say <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> To His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> He Is Risen <S%G1453><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dead; <S%G3498><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> He Goes Before <S%G4254><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Galilee; <S%G1056><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Ye Shall See. <S%G3700><s%>, Lo, <S%G2400><s%> I Have Told <S%G2036><s%> You. <S%G5213><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Gone Out <S%G1831><s%> Quickly <S%G5035><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tomb <S%G3419><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Fear <S%G5401><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Joy <S%G5479><s%> Great, <S%G3173><s%> They Ran <S%G5143><s%> To Tell It <S%G518><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> To His Disciples. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G5613><s%> But As <S%G1161><s%> They Were Going <S%G4198><s%> To Tell It <S%G518><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> To His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Met <S%G528><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Hail! <S%G5463><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> Having Come To Him <S%G4334><s%> Seized Hold Of <S%G2902><s%>, His <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Feet, <S%G4228><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Worshipped <S%G4352><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2424><s%> Jesus, <S%G3361><s%> Fear Not : <S%G5399><s%> Go, <S%G5217><s%> Tell <S%G518><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> My Brethren <S%G3450><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> They Go <S%G565><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> And There <S%G2546><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> Shall They See. <S%G3700><s%>

<S%G4198><s%> And As They Were Going <S%G1161><s%> They, <S%G846><s%>, Lo, <S%G2400><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Guard <S%G2892><s%> Having Gone <S%G2064><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> Reported <S%G518><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Priests <S%G749><s%> All Things <S%G537><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Were Done. <S%G1096><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Been Gathered Together <S%G4863><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elders, <S%G4245><s%> <S%G4824><s%> And Counsel <S%G5037><s%> Having Taken, <S%G2983><s%> Money <S%G694><s%> Much <S%G2425><s%> They Gave <S%G1325><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Soldiers, <S%G4757><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Say <S%G2036><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples <S%G846><s%> By Night <S%G3571><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> Stole <S%G2813><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> We <S%G2257><s%> Being Asleep. <S%G2837><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Be Heard <S%G191><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> By <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Governor, <S%G2232><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Will Persuade <S%G3982><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Free From Care <S%G275><s%> Will Make. <S%G4160><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> Having Taken <S%G2983><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Money <S%G694><s%> Did <S%G4160><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> . They Were Taught. <S%G1321><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Is Spread Abroad <S%G1310><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Report <S%G3056><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Among The <S%G3844><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> Until <S%G3360><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Present. <S%G4594><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Eleven <S%G1733><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> Went <S%G4198><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mountain <S%G3735><s%> Whither <S%G3757><s%> Appointed <S%G5021><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Seeing <S%G1492><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> They Worshipped <S%G4352><s%> Him : <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But Some <S%G1161><s%> Doubted. <S%G1365><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come To Them <S%G4334><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Spoke <S%G2980><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Has Been Given <S%G1325><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> Earth. <S%G1093><s%>

Going <S%G4198><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Disciple <S%G3100><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations, <S%G1484><s%> Baptizing <S%G907><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit; <S%G4151><s%>

Teaching <S%G1321><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> To Observe <S%G5083><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> Whatsoever <S%G3745><s%> I Commanded <S%G1781><s%> You. <S%G5213><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Lo, <S%G2400><s%> I 1473 P-1NS ' With 3326 PREP You 5216 P-2GP Am 1510 V-PXI-1S All 3956 A-APF The 3588 T-APF Days 2250 N-APF Until 2193 CONJ The 3588 T-GSF Completion 4930 N-GSF Of The 3588 T-GSM Age. 165 N-GSM Amen. 281 HEB
